summary: 14-day Shadow Pilot Implementation - All 11 features verified. Backend: 15/15 tests pass (pilot status, daily-metrics, logs, accuracy, trend endpoints). Frontend: All 3 new pages render correctly with proper data-testids (Pilot Dashboard 13/13, Sales Workflows 8/8, Operations Workflows 7/7). Navigation includes all new workflow pages.
critical_code_review_comments: Pilot status API correctly returns pilot_mode_enabled=true, current_phase=shadow_pilot_v1, and blocking flags
Daily metrics API correctly aggregates by doc_type, classification method, and stuck documents
Document upload correctly adds pilot_phase and pilot_date metadata when pilot mode enabled
PilotDashboardPage shows all 5 summary cards (Total Docs, Accuracy, AI Usage, Vendor Extraction, Stuck)
SalesWorkflowsPage and OperationsWorkflowsPage show 'Observation Mode' badge and pilot warning banner
All pages have proper data-testid attributes for automated testing
Navigation sidebar correctly includes Pilot Dashboard, Sales Workflows, and Operations links
seed_data_creation: Test pilot documents created during backend tests (cleaned up after)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pilot implementation complete and verified. Key verified behaviors: 1) /api/pilot/status returns pilot_mode_enabled=true with exports_blocked and bc_validation_blocked, 2) /api/pilot/daily-metrics returns summary with total_documents, ai_usage_rate, vendor_extraction_rate, 3) /api/pilot/logs returns paginated logs with pilot_phase filter, 4) /api/pilot/accuracy returns accuracy_score and time_in_status_distribution, 5) /api/pilot/trend returns daily trend data by doc_type, 6) Document upload adds pilot_phase=shadow_pilot_v1 and pilot_date, 7) Pilot Dashboard page renders with shadow_pilot_v1 badge, 5 summary cards, Documents by Type breakdown, Daily Trend chart, Workflow Stalls and Misclassifications tables, 8) Sales Workflows page shows Observation Mode badge and Shadow Pilot Mode Active banner, 9) Operations Workflows page shows PO and Quality sections with Pilot Only filter, 10) All 3 new pages in navigation sidebar

pilot_daily_metrics_api.evidence: GET /api/pilot/daily-metrics returns 200 with summary, by_doc_type, stuck_documents

pilot_accuracy_api.evidence: GET /api/pilot/accuracy returns 200 with accuracy_score and time_in_status_distribution

pilot_trend_api.evidence: GET /api/pilot/trend returns 200 with trend array and doc_types

document_upload_pilot_metadata.evidence: Upload adds pilot_phase=shadow_pilot_v1 and pilot_date to documents

pilot_dashboard_page.evidence: Page renders with all 13 expected elements including summary cards and charts

sales_workflows_page.evidence: Page renders with Observation Mode badge and 8/8 expected elements

operations_workflows_page.evidence: Page renders with PO and Quality sections, 7/7 expected elements

pilot_badge_on_documents.evidence: Pilot documents visible in Document Queue (test_pilot_doc.txt with pilot metadata)

navigation_includes_new_pages.evidence: All 3 nav links exist: pilot-dashboard, sales-workflows, operations-workflows
